description: This Dart source file defines an ApiClient class that serves as a singleton HTTP client wrapper around the Dio package. It configures the client with base URL and default headers, manages authentication tokens via shared preferences, and provides methods for performing HTTP GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A singleton class providing configured HTTP methods for API interactions, including automatic token handling via interceptors.

methods.name: ApiClient
methods.description: Internal constructor that initializes the Dio client with base options and request interceptors.
